name: BathTimeDecider
0:
”Alexa, open bath time decider”
”Alexa, ask bath time decider to decide who showers first”
”Alexa, ask bath time decider to decide who baths first”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bath time decider
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A simple skill used to ease the decision of who will be bathing or showering first. 

The decisions include youngest, oldest, flipping a coin and Rock Paper Scissors to make this decision a bit more fun.

To start, just say "Alexa, open bath time decider" or "Alexa, open bath time decider to see who showers first" to get a decision.

User: "Alexa, open bath time decider"
Skill: "Todays decision is: Rock paper scissors, best of 1."

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
